name: Monochromatic Mayhem!
description:
You are stuck in a monochromatic world fighting to survive, all shapes trying to attack and destroy you!

||Mobile Friendly||

Use the arrow keys, WAD, or just move mouse around to move.
Mouse Pointer to aim.
Mouse Click or Space to shoot

The square- Moves at a constant speed in a random direction

The triangle- Will constantly move towards you!

The diamond- Does the same thing as the square, but bounces of the edge!

The hexagon- Will do the same as the square, but will randomly point towards the player!

The star- Does the same thing as the triangle, but constantly speeds up, and drifts. When shot, you can choose almost any upgrade!
